page.title: 13Housing
page.content: Accomodation H/Green M/Bank ____________ _______ ______ Bungalows { 1 4 Bungalows - Semi { 0 2 Semi-detached { 22 10 Detached { 5 1 Terraced {41 49 {Hassall Green.}There were mainly semi- detached houses(2 newly renovated). The terraces were in blocks of 4 & 6. Hassall Green has a large Council estate and the majority of the semi- detached and terraced property are the Councils.{Malkins Bank. }Most of the houses are owned not rented, a few remain rented Council houses. The South side was nearly all owned and a few of the houses were Edwardian. The terraces are in blocks of 4 & 5. There are only garages on either end of the terraces. South of the canal there are 6 cottages and a detached house.
